${ModID}:ChaosRelic.NAME: Chaos Realm
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, obtain #b%d random common relic. NL At the end of the turn, gain #b%d #y${ModID}:Keyflare. For every #b%d points of #g${ModID}:Realm_Mastery you have, after releasing a #y${ModID}:Posse, you gain #b%d #y${ModID}:Aliemus.
NL Current #gRealm #gMastery: #b%d NL Current #yAliemus gain after releasing #yPosse: #b%d

${ModID}:RamonaRelic.NAME: Silverheart Resonance
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d #y${ModID}:Keyflare at the start of combat. For every #b%d #y${ModID}:Command_Card played, the #y${ModID}:Keyflare_Regen increases by #b%d in this battle.

${ModID}:LotanRelic.NAME: Sword Unleashed
DESCRIPTIONS: Base Damage of #yStrike #b+%d%%. After each active attack, Base Damage of cards in this battle #b+%d%%.

${ModID}:KleinBottleVoyager.NAME: Lost Resonance
DESCRIPTIONS: After releasing a #y${ModID}:Posse, gain #b%d #y${ModID}:Temporary #yStrength.

${ModID}:RamonaTimewormRelic.NAME: Penrose Pilgrim
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d stack of #y${ModID}:Negentropy at the end of each turn. The first time #y${ModID}:Loop is triggered each turn, gain #b%d stack of #yNegentropy.

${ModID}:LaurelCufflinks.NAME: Laurel Cufflinks
${ModID}:LaurelCufflinks.FLAVOR: Silver cufflinks engraved with osmanthus leaf patterns. Finely crafted and gleaming, they once embodied the friendship of two children.
DESCRIPTIONS: gains #b%d #y${ModID}:Aliemus after the turn starts.

${ModID}:HeavyLock.NAME: Heavy Lock
${ModID}:HeavyLock.FLAVOR: A thick and sturdy lock, difficult to open without a key. Of course, this is nothing for a master thief.
DESCRIPTIONS: After releasing #y${ModID}:Exalt, Obtain #b%d #y${ModID}:Temporary Strength.

${ModID}:Neurotoxin.NAME: Neurotoxin
DESCRIPTIONS: #yStrike applies #b%d stacks of #pPoison to all enemies.

${ModID}:SuspiciousOintment.NAME: Suspicious Ointment
${ModID}:SuspiciousOintment.FLAVOR: Some kind of homemade ointment for external injuries. Do not use without a doctor's guidance.
DESCRIPTIONS: At turn end, for each card in hand, inflict #b%d stacks of #pPoison on all enemies.

${ModID}:ButterflySpecimen.NAME: Butterfly Specimen
${ModID}:ButterflySpecimen.FLAVOR: To this day, he is still deeply loved by someone.
DESCRIPTIONS: When causing HP healing, also grants #b%d #yBlock. After the start of the #b3rd turn, gain #b%d #yDexterity.

${ModID}:ActiveInjector.NAME: Active Injector
${ModID}:ActiveInjector.FLAVOR: Twitching is also a form of vitality.
DESCRIPTIONS: Max [E] increased by #b%d.

${ModID}:SailorsWhistle.NAME: Sailor's Whistle
${ModID}:SailorsWhistle.FLAVOR: Apart from mermaids, the whistle can summon hurricanes, smelly boots, and sailors who haven't bathed in a hundred days.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b8th time you gain #yBlock, heal HP equal to #b%d%% of the Block gained.

${ModID}:OurHome.NAME: Our Home
${ModID}:OurHome.FLAVOR: They were together in the past, and they will always be together in the future. They are a close-knit and loving family.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b%d #yBlock when dealing active damage. Gain #b%d #y${ModID}:Temporary #yStrength when healing HP.

${ModID}:PrasnoMirror.NAME: Prasno Mirror
${ModID}:PrasnoMirror.FLAVOR: The trick of Light and Shadow
DESCRIPTIONS: When the turn starts, draw #b%d card. At the start of the combat, shuffle #b%d "Insight" into your Draw Pile. Each #b%d battle will increase the number of "Insight" cards shuffled into Draw Pile by #b%d, up to #b%d cards.

${ModID}:StellarBrew.NAME: Stellar Brew
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b8th #y${ModID}:Command_Card you play will take effect twice.

${ModID}:PrototypeBattery.NAME: Prototype Battery
DESCRIPTIONS: When the turn ends, gain #b%d #y${ModID}:Aliemus. For each remaining [E] , gain #b%d additional #y${ModID}:Aliemus.

${ModID}:PriestsStaff.NAME: Priest's Staff
DESCRIPTIONS: Deal #b%d%% more damage to enemies with debuffs. Gain #b%d #y${ModID}:Aliemus upon killing enemies.

${ModID}:TinyCradle.NAME: Tiny Cradle
DESCRIPTIONS: After unleashing #b%d #y${ModID}:Exalt, gain #b%d #y${ModID}:Aliemus.

${ModID}:AshesOfTheBurningBlackStar.NAME: Ashes of the Burning Black Star
DESCRIPTIONS: When picked, choose #b%d #y${ModID}:Command_Cards to Delete. At the start of each combat, Obtain #b%d #yStrength.
Choose %d cards to Delete.

${ModID}:BlackCandle.NAME: Black Candle
${ModID}:BlackCandle.FLAVOR: Burn in clarity, fall into illusion.
DESCRIPTIONS: Max [E] increased by #b%d. Each time the deck is reset, add #b%d "Stagger" to the Draw Pile.
